comments.body: The new tests here pass before this PR. I'm adding them to prove that nested 0.0/-0.0 is fine. `CodegenContext.genComp` is very conservative and only does the shortcut when both sides are unsafe format and they equal to each other in binary. for 0.0 and -0.0, they do not equal to each other in binary and will fallback to the element-by-element comparison.
